A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You take one of the biggest characters in movie history\, Luke Skywalker\, and you minimalize his impact. The fact that Rey and Kylo had more power\, and more impact\, and more inspiration for the future of the universe than the Last Jedi himself\, who defeated Darth Vader\, is a freaking joke. I don't even want to get into the discussion of who all of the main characters were\, and what that agenda was. Another joke. Last Star Wars I will pay for ever to see in the theater.
